title: AHH i went down like 9 times in a ranked match plz help

replies.body: Hmmmm if everyone was disconnecting at the same time, there could have been some kind of hiccup with your connection to the specific game server you were playing on. We can cover all of our bases by going over the steps in this [**Connection Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). Let me know if you have any other issues!
